quote: My home value is directly tied to the listings that I get. If I give away the listings, it's not going to do my own house any good.
why_clipworthy: This quote highlights a unique perspective on why agents should focus on their local market.
suggested_hook: Why your home value depends on your real estate listings!

quote: Garage sales are a great way to find potential sellers because people often have them when they're preparing to move.
why_clipworthy: This provides a tactical tip that agents can implement immediately.
suggested_hook: Want to find your next seller? Look for garage sales!
